dt-button.name: savedStates
dt-button.summary: Collection used to provide interaction with the saved states
dt-button.description: This is a collection that contains a number of `-button stateRestore` buttons, one for each state that is being stored by `-init stateRestore`.
dt-button.option: This function runs the `-api i18n()` function to decide the text value of the saved state collection button. The value of this button can be set using the `-init i18n` initialisation options `-init language.button.savedStates` property, or you could directly change the value of this function.
The name of this button is set to 'SaveStateRestore', this allows StateRestore to know which button the `-button stateRestore` buttons should be placed under.
This function initialises StateRestore if is has not already been initialised.
